TestDescription.name: Apache Tomcat examples directory vulnerabilities
TestDescription.Description:
Apache Tomcat default installation contains the "/examples" directory which has many example servlets and JSPs. Some of these examples are a security risk and should not be deployed on a production server. [break]
The Sessions Example servlet (installed at [dark]/examples/servlets/servlet/SessionExample[/dark]) allows session manipulation. Because the session is global this servlet poses a big security risk as an attacker can potentitally become an administrator by manipulating its session.
TestDescription.Impact: Bypassing HttpOnly Cookies protection, CSRF cookies manipulation, Session manipulation.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Disable public access to the examples directory.
